title: 4/19/17 - Bill O'Reilly out at Fox News?... Hobby Lobby Founder David Green Joins Glenn
description:
Bill O'Reilly out at Fox News? ...Did Fox News save America? ...The targeted attack of Media Matters on Fox New's most popular host ...Glenn discusses the past money troubles of The Blaze ...Steve Bannon feeding stories to a conspiracy web site? ...David Green of Hobby Lobby stops by ...Being a servant to your customers ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio

Facebook: Glenn BeckTwitter: @glennbeck
